add_library(ftd2xx STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(ftd2xx PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ftd2xx.lib)
target_include_directories(ftd2xx INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_library(libusb0 STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(libusb0 PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/libusb.a)
target_include_directories(libusb0 INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
